scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run babel && npm run ignore && npm run build:pure && npm run bundle && npm run minify && npm run gzip
scripts.build:pure: npm run bundle:pure && npm run minify:pure
scripts.bundle: sh -c echo require\(\'utilise\'\);cat dist/index.js | cat | browserify - -o dist/ripple.js -i rijs.sessions -i rijs.resdir -i rijs.serve -i rijs.redis -i rijs.pages -i express -i bufferutil -i utf-8-validate -g ./clientify.js -i mysql -i rijs.hypermedia -i colors
scripts.bundle:pure: browserify dist/index.js -o dist/ripple.pure.js -g ./purify -i socket.io -i mysql -i jsondiffpatch -i socket.io-client -i **/utilise/**/*.js -i rijs.hypermedia --no-builtins -i colors -i utilise -i rijs.sessions -i rijs.resdir -i rijs.serve -i rijs.pages -i rijs.redis
scripts.gzip: gzip -c dist/ripple.min.js > dist/ripple.min.js.gz && gzip -c dist/ripple.pure.min.js > dist/ripple.pure.min.js.gz
scripts.ignore: find ./dist -type f -exec sed -i "s/function _interopRequire/\/* istanbul ignore next *\/\nfunction _interopRequire/g" {} \;
